text: OMG! (Oh My God!) 2 is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language satirical comedy-drama movie written and directed by Amit Rai. It is a spiritual sequel to Umesh Shukla's 2012 film OMG! (Oh My God!). It stars Akshay Kumar, Pankaj Tripathi, Arun Govil and Yami Gautam in the lead roles. The film revolves around the subject of a Indian education system. put a stop to Board stops OMG 2 starring Akshay requesting motion picture change. ==Cast== *Akshay Kumar as Lord Shiva *Pankaj Tripathi *Arun Govil as Lord Rama *Yami Gautam *Govind Namdev as TBA ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2023 movies Category:2020s Indian movies Category:Action thriller movies
title: OMG! (Oh My God!) 2
